nodes.text: The One Twenty-Fifth task force was a task force in the Imperial Navy commanded by Admiral Kinshara, whose flagship was the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Stalwart. During the Imperial Era, the force was ordered to pacify a group of insurgents on the planet Denash by Imperial Fleet Admiral Jok Donassius, after the rebels' conflict with the world's governor, Wistran.

The battle was also part of a larger Imperial operation across the entire Batonn sector designed to stop various rebel cells in that region, including Denash's, from joining forces on the planet Batonn. Admiral Kinshara easily won the battle with the Stalwart and the One Twenty-Fifth, although interrogation of their prisoners suggested that most of the insurgents' ships and materials had already been moved to Batonn.
The One Twenty-Fifth task force was first mentioned in Timothy Zahn's 2017 novel Thrawn, the first book in the Star Wars: Thrawn series.
